text: وَمِنَ ٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمِ حَمُولَةٗ وَفَرۡشٗاۚ كُلُواْ مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ وَلَا تَتَّبِعُواْ خُطُوَٰتِ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَكُمۡ عَدُوّٞ مُّبِينٞ
translation: Imana Allah Yaremye no mu bitungwa ibishobora kwikorera; nk’ingamiya, n’ibindi bidashoboye kwikorera; nk’inka n’intungwa. Muraheza rero mufungure mu vyo mwaronkejwe n’Imana Allah muri ivyo bitungwa, ntimuzohirahire ngo mukurikire inzira za shetani zo kuziririza ivyaziruwe n’Imana Allah. Mu vy’ukuri, shetani ni umwansi wanyu agaragara;
